(Don't worry!!! Yanshos, you had a trouble with a snake. Well, 
buddies, I hope that your character cover their heards beacuse it'll 
be noisy)

:: Vampra::

Vamprah was convulsing like if she was fighting with a invisible 
enemy, she also was trying to quit off her neck the necklance that 
producing the discarges. In necklans a red light was turn on and 
discharges was increasing until she gaves a high scream of unbeared 
proportions that brokes a computer's screen that was around

At last, the discharge ended; the red light turned off and a blue 
light turned on  and Vamprah started breathing as if she tried to 
recover her breath. She continued moaning, the dischage made her some 
damages
